42.heading: HORROR COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
42.title: The Dead
42.author: story by Mike Mignola and John Arcudi ; art by Guy Davis ; colors by Dave Stewart ; letters by Clem Robins.
notes: "This book collects the B.P.R.D. The Dead comic book series issues 1-5, published by Dark Horse Comics and the story "B.P.R.D. Born Again" from the Hellboy Premiere Edition published by Dark Horse Comics and Gareb Shamus Enterprises"

Summary Abe Sapien has a personal paranormal experience when he comes home to a drowned wife. Then, with the plague of frogs escalating, the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense moves their task force into an abandoned government research station where they find a mad Nazi scientist who has been trapped there for fifty years.

64.heading: HORROR COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
64.title: Demon City Shinjuku. Volume 1
64.author: story, Hideyuki Kikuchi ; art, Shin-ichi Hosoma ; translator, Jeff and Masako Lilly.
notes: Summary: The borders between the earthly and spirit world have cracked right beneath Shinjuku, and the town is full of demons, one of whom has cursed Earth's president. High school student Kyoya Izayoi, heir to the rare martial art nenpo, wields a mystical sword, Ashura, and together with Sayaka Rama, the president's daughter, takes on the master of the demons.

65.heading: HORROR COMIC BOOKS, STRIPS, ETC.
65.title: Demon City Shinjuku. Volume 2
65.author: story, Hideyuki Kikuchi ; art, Shin-ichi Hosoma.
notes: "The super-action adventure series comes to a close as the President of the Earth Federal Government is near death and Kyoya Izayoi uses the martial art of Nenpo to battle the Heretic Levy Rah again. Levy Rah is protected by three demon bodyguards, and only he can reverse the evil spell he cast on the President. Follow Izoyoi's hunt for the demon bodyguards and Levy Rah, deep into the Demon City Shinjuku. Find out how good defeats evil."
